backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required updates to LandingPage.tsx, including layout, icons, and UI behaviors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high‑level descriptions of key frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage component.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page UI with navbar, hero, service-rate cards, benefits strip, UPI section, and WhatsApp button using lucide-react and react-icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, custom colors, animations, and extended theme settings including container, border radius, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, versioning, and a list of implemented features covering ICP canister setup, frontend auth, UI system, build tooling, and marketing-site functionality.
